resources.string: Password field should not be empty
Your password must be atleast 8 digits
Please accept the terms and conditions
You should get atleast 100 votes in Level1 to go for level2
You should buy Premium membership to go for Level2

ViralTube, a Mobile Application based company is established in the IT Headquarter of India. Thinking beyond the conventional ways of what can be perpetrated with video sharing and advertising revenue,Our model whirls around this traditional business model. Thereby, we intend to earmark this vision of company in reaching the mass of entire India, its people and its youth in getting ahead with the mind blogging multifariousness of the company.

To attain leadership and set a benchmark for video sharing and advertisement revenue generating application on the ever booming android field of technology by inculcation within the app intensified services and desired profits.

ViralTube envisions a rostrum for present youth and the people where everyone is set glued to their smart phones on which information flows through the tip of fingers through various applications. Your valuable time on our application stands out to be the best with our services that are bound to influence our users to the greatest extent and a whole new awesome experience.

To act with decorum and deliver as promised, build a never ending alliance with our application users and also the clients. Pledge to provide unmatched quality experience by carrying business in the most innovative method in sync with the upmarket technology.

An epidemic augmentation into the sphere of video content sharing and overshadow the entire Indian market of various video sharing platforms. Henceforth, inventing the best foundation for its key users. Invariably skyrocket the number of users and the investment towards the company in achieving utmost support towards the various services development. To befit as a key player in the video content sharing and advertisement revenue generation industry.

We trust in handling our application users with esteem obeisance. Inculcating our other core values such s innovation, trend changing ideas, market revolutionary plans. All of these incorporated with uplift creativity and inventions. At ViralTube the jeans run with the best of morality, rectitude, solidarity,unification and ethical functioning of our business.

First time ever in the history of Karnataka!! Multi-talent REALITY SHOW on the app. Viral tube is a voting based reality show app to provide an opportunity to people from all walks of life to showcase their talent and rise to fame. It is a true celebration of the youthful spirit, that features stellar performances of singers, dancers, theatre artists, beatboxers, musicians, comedians, magicians, and many more talents, all vying for their chance to win the entry to the golden stage and become a real celebrity. To sign up as a participant, download the app and provide basic info about your self to receive more information via email. Viewers, ﬁnd exclusive content of never-seen-before performances and receive updates about your favourite contestants.

Level 1 :Introduce yourself about your interests and answer - why do yo want to participate in this reality show? 
 • Perform with a live camera on any activity that you are passionate about. Activities can include but not limited to only singing, dancing, mimicry, dubsmash, spoof, rampwalk, bodyshows, acting, beatboxing, gymnastics, comedy, playing - guitar, ﬂute etc., 
 • Upload your live recording or any of your past/present projects on our app. Public watches your video and if they like, they will vote for you. If you get 100 likes, you will be enter level 2. Hurray!! 
 
Level 2 : There will be few tasks that you can choose based on your activity of interest. 
 • Pick one task and record your live performance and upload on the app. Here is a small twist! Only top voted performers will proceed to level 3. 
 
Level 3: This level decides your destiny. 
 • You will combat with the performer who has chosen the same task in level 2 and with same number votes. 
 • The performer with highest votes in stipulated time will be the winner. This unveils the curtain for you to the golden stage. That sounds exciting and challenging, isn’t it?!! By participating in this online audition and submitting an online audition video for consideration by Viral Tube producers and viewers, your performance/task acknowledges that you read, understand and voluntarily agree to abide by these Online Audition and Video Submission Terms and Conditions. The effective date of these Terms and Conditions shall be the date on which you submit your Audition Video in the ‘Level 1’, as described above.

1. The performance includes a participant who performs alone. 
 
 2. Any participant who is under the age of eighteen on the date of submission must have his or her parent or legal guardian’s permission to participate in the Online Audition. 
 
 3. Producer reserves the right to remove any participant/person from the Program who is sufﬁciently connected with the Program or Producer, subsidiaries or afﬁliated companies, or any other person or entity connected with the production, administration, any television station or channel, cable network, or satellite network that may air or otherwise exhibit the Program or any variation thereof; any person or entity involved in the development, production, distribution, or other exploitation of the Program or any variation thereof, producer determines that such person’s involvement in the Program does not and will not affect the integrity of the Program

• The participant must submit ONLY ONE Audition Video of their interested task. 
 
 • Audition Videos should be submitted only on the Viral Tube APP. Audition Videos will NOT be accepted after 11:59 p.m. on the close of the Video Submission Period .
 
 • Participant (or the parent or legal guardian of a participant that is a minor in his or her state of residence) must have Internet access during the Video Submission Period, and sign up on Online Audition APP.
 
 • Viral Tube is NOT responsible for any physical damage or public damage (if the task is a prank-related or street performance etc.,)of the participants during their performances in any of the levels.

• Video should be not be greater than 3–4 minutes. It may include a short introduction (not more than 30 seconds) stating the name of the performance, and any other information the performer would like to convey. \n \n • Audition Videos must NOT contain material which is sexually explicit, obscene, pornographic, violent (for example, relating to murder, weapons, cruelty, abuse, etc.), discriminatory (based on race, sex, religion, national origin, physical disability, sexual orientation or age), illegal (for example, underage drinking, substance abuse, computer hacking, etc.), offensive, threatening, profane or harassing.
• Audition Videos submitted for consideration in this Online Audition will be judged by the public who installed ViralTube app.

• Producer reserves the right to disqualify and/or exclude, in its sole and absolute discretion, any individual from the audition process for any reason or for no reason at all, including without limitation, violation of any portion of these Terms and Conditions, or tampering with the entry process or the audition process.

• There are no charges to submit performance for Level 1 auditions.
 
 • Once the participant wins 100 votes, he/she needs to pay the entry charges for level 2 i.e.,Rs.630 only.
 
 • This will be online payment and non-refundable. Transfers to other individuals will NOT be entertained.
 
 ELIGIBLE PARTICIPANTS MUST SUBMIT THE AUDITION VIDEO IN ACCORDANCE WITH THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.
 
 We look forward to share this enthralling journey with you!
